fatigue+irregular periods.tip: Track your cycle and consult a gynecologist

fatigue+dizziness.tip: Increase iron-rich foods like ragi and drumstick leaves

bloating+cramps.tip: Try ginger tea, avoid processed foods before periods

acne+weight gain.tip: Reduce sugar intake, consider seeing an endocrinologist

mood swings+bloating.tip: Track symptoms across your cycle for patterns

nausea+fatigue.tip: Eat smaller frequent meals, increase B12 and iron intake

irregular periods+acne.tip: Consult a gynecologist for hormone panel tests

back pain+cramps.tip: Apply heat, try ginger tea, see doctor if severe

headache+fatigue.tip: Increase water intake, check hemoglobin levels
